Yenson is a Full-Stack AI/ML Engineer with 5+ years of experience and Azure AI-102 and AZ-204 certifications. He has earned 3 promotions in 2 years at Wind River, building scalable cloud-native systems with React, Node.js, Golang, and Python across distributed architectures.

His strongest technical areas are full-stack development with React/Next.js and Node.js, cloud-native Azure infrastructure, and AI/ML integration. He has deep expertise in microservices architecture using gRPC, GraphQL, Apache Pulsar, and containerized deployments with Docker and Kubernetes.

What sets Yenson apart is his rare combination of 3 rapid promotions, dual Azure certifications (AI-102 & AZ-204), and an entrepreneurial drive — he's built and shipped production products from scratch including e-commerce platforms and AI-powered tools, while leading teams and mentoring junior engineers.

Yenson started in customer-facing technical support, rapidly transitioned into software engineering at Wind River, and earned 3 promotions in under 2 years — progressing from intern to Software Engineer II while taking on tech lead responsibilities and driving CI/CD modernization across teams.

Yenson would thrive in a fast-paced, product-driven team that values full-stack ownership and AI innovation. He's ideal for companies building cloud-native applications where engineers own features end-to-end and contribute across the entire stack from infrastructure to user experience.
